<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search vendors"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches for vendors with filtering and pagination options via request body. Provides more flexibility than the GET endpoint for complex queries.

**Request Options**
- `PagingOptions` - Page number and page size for pagination
- `Filters` - Array of filter conditions for field-based queries
- `Fields` - Optional field selection to limit response data

**Workflow Example**
1. Build filter request with `PagingOptions` and optional `Filters` array.
2. Call this endpoint: [POST /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors](/docs/api/invoicing/search-vendors) with the request body.
3. Process paginated results using `Paging.Page` and `Paging.Total`.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors](/docs/api/invoicing/get-all-vendors) - Simple list without filters
- [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/get-vendor-by-id) - Get specific vendor details

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Search parameters including filters and paging options.","required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for retrieving vendors with optional filtering and paging.","properties":{"Fields":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Optional list of field names to include in the response. If not specified, all fields are returned.","items":{"type":"string"}},"PagingOptions":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Pagination and sorting options for list requests","properties":{"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records per page. Use -1 for unlimited (not recommended for large datasets).","default":-1,"example":50},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based page index","default":0,"minimum":0,"example":0},"SortField":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Field name to sort results by. Available fields depend on the entity type.","example":"Name"},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Sort direction for the primary sort field","default":"Ascending"},"SecondarySortOptions":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Sort configuration for a single field","properties":{"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Field name to sort by"},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Sort direction","default":"Ascending"}},"required":["SortField"],"title":"SortOptions"},"description":"Additional sort criteria applied after the primary sort"}},"title":"PagingOptions"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Pagination settings for the result set."},"Filters":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Filter conditions to apply to the vendor search.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Universal filter structure used across all search endpoints (Tickets, Assets, Users). Each FilterMatch targets a specific facet and provides criteria through either the `Id` field (for entity references) or the `Value` field (for expressions).\n\n## Supported Entity Types\n\n| Entity | Facet Key Reference | Total Facets |\n|--------|---------------------|-------------|\n| Tickets | `TicketSearchFacetKey` | 103 |\n| Assets | `AssetSearchFacetKey` | 75 |\n| Users | `UserSearchFacetKey` | 41 |\n\n## Field Usage by Facet Type\n\n| Facet Type | Use Field | Example |\n|------------|-----------|--------|\n| Entity reference (status, agent, location) | `Id` | `{\"Facet\": \"status\", \"Id\": \"guid-here\"}` |\n| Date expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"createddate\", \"Value\": \"range:thisweek\"}` |\n| Numeric expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"purchasedprice\", \"Value\": \"numoperator:greaterthan:100\"}` |\n| Keyword search | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"keyword\", \"Value\": \"laptop\"}` |\n| Boolean facet | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"isurgent\", \"Value\": \"true\"}` |\n\n## Filter Combination Logic\n\n- **Default (AND)**: All filters are combined with AND logic\n- **OR within groups**: Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR logic\n- **Exclusion**: Set `Negative: true` to exclude matching records\n\n## Expression Syntax Reference\n\nSee `DateExpressionSyntax` and `NumericExpressionSyntax` schemas for detailed syntax documentation.\n\n## Universal Facets\n\nSix facets are shared across all search endpoints: `grade`, `location`, `locationtype`, `role`, `source`, `user`. See `UniversalFacets` schema for detailed cross-entity behavior documentation.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"The facet key identifying the filter type. Valid values depend on the entity being searched:\n- Tickets: See `TicketSearchFacetKey`\n- Assets: See `AssetSearchFacetKey`\n- Users: See `UserSearchFacetKey`\n\nRetrieve available facets via `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}`.","example":"status"},"FacetName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable display name for the facet. Populated by the UI when saving filters.","example":"Ticket Status"},"Name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display label for the selected value. Populated by the UI for saved filters.","example":"Open"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID value for entity-reference facets. Use this field when filtering by a specific entity's identifier (e.g., status ID, location ID, user ID).","example":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value for expression-based facets. Syntax varies by facet type:\n- Date facets: See `DateExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`)\n- Numeric facets: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- Keyword: Plain text search term\n- Boolean: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"When `true`, excludes records matching this filter instead of including them. Inverts the filter logic.","example":false},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Groups filters for OR logic. Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR, then groups are combined with AND. Default value of 0 means all filters use AND logic.","example":0},"Selected":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Indicates the filter is active. Always `true` when applying filters via API.","example":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type when this filter targets a custom field. Used with facets like `usercustomfield`, `assetcustomfield`, or `ticketcustomfield`."},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Path identifier for complex editor configuration. Used when the filter requires a specialized UI editor component."},"SortOrder":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Sort order hint for display purposes when presenting multiple filter options."},"AggregateOperation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"enum":["and","or"],"description":"Logical operation for aggregate filters. When set, this filter acts as a container combining `Children` filters with the specified operation. Use `and` to require all children match, `or` to match any child."},"Children":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Nested filter conditions for aggregate filters. Only used when `AggregateOperation` is set. Allows building complex nested filter expressions.","items":"circular(FilterMatch)"}},"required":["Facet"],"example":{"Facet":"status","FacetName":"Status","Name":"Open","Id":"38889bac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001","Negative":false,"GroupIndex":0,"Selected":true},"title":"FilterMatch"}}},"title":"GetAllVendorsRequest"},"example":{"Fields":null,"PagingOptions":{"Page":1,"PageSize":25},"Filters":null}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
